# Supplementary figures and tables

(ref:all-energies-caption) $\energyNuc$ for each system as a function of charge, with quadratic fit, and a dot indicating the frame with no field applied.

```{r all-energies, echo=FALSE, fig.cap="(ref:all-energies-caption)", out.width="100%"}
knitr::include_graphics("3-5:zincblende:0_energy_with_nofield.png")
```

(ref:all-electronegativities-caption) $\Delta \chi$ computed by discrete differences between frames and by a correction to $\lambda$.

```{r all-electronegativities, echo=FALSE, fig.cap="(ref:all-electronegativities-caption)", out.width="100%"}
knitr::include_graphics("3-5:zincblende:0_lam_comparison.png")
```

(ref:electronegativity-max-deviations-caption) Maximum absolute difference between the two methods of computing $\Delta \chi$.

```{r electronegativity-max-deviations, echo=FALSE, out.width="100%"}
electronegativity_max_deviations_tbl <- read_csv('supplementary_table_electronegativity_max_deviations.csv', col_types = cols(
    structure_id = col_character(),
    maximum_absolute_error = col_double()
))
knitr::kable(electronegativity_max_deviations_tbl, digits = 3, caption = "(ref:electronegativity-max-deviations-caption)")
```
